Returns: true if this cookie should be accepted; otherwise, false
Parameters: URI: the URI to consult accept policy with
HttpCookie: the HttpCookie object in question
shouldAccept(java.net.URI, java.net.Http.Description: Will be called to see whether or not this cookie should be accepted.
shouldAccept(java.net.URI, java.net.Http.FullName: public abstract boolean shouldAccept (URI uri, HttpCookie cookie)

Returns: true if this cookie should be accepted; otherwise, false
Parameters: URI: the URI to consult accept policy with
HttpCookie: the HttpCookie object in question
shouldAccept(java.net.URI,java.net.HttpC.Description: Will be called to see whether or not this cookie should be accepted.
shouldAccept(java.net.URI,java.net.HttpC.FullName: public abstract boolean shouldAccept (URI uri, HttpCookie cookie)

ClassDesc: CookiePolicy implementations decide which cookies should be accepted and which should be rejected. Three pre-defined policy implementations are provided, namely ACCEPT_ALL, ACCEPT_NONE and ACCEPT_ORIGINAL_SERVER. See RFC 2965 sec. 3.3 and 7 for more detail.
